info.title: Horoscope API Documentation
info.description:
## Indexer for multiple Cosmos Network 

### How to use

Select server Horoscope if use Horoscope API

Select server LCD if use Legacy API

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain Id of network need to query

get.description: Get delegation information of an address

parameters.description: Chain Id of network need to query

parameters.name: pageLimit
parameters.description: number record return in a page
